1.label: Lifeline
1.description: This group is normally automatically assigned to the Z-Wave system controller when EZMultiPli is added to the ZWave network.

2.label: Basic
2.description: This group is used to directly turn lights on or off when motion is detected.

paramInformation.label: Light Level Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Sets the interval for light level reports; 0 to disable

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Sets the interval for temp level reports; 0 to disable
